Name: Balabushka
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: This vodka-based cocktail has flavours of apple, lemon, orange and almond.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2001 by Julien Escot at Langdon Hall Hotel in Cambridge, Ontario, Canada. Named in homage to George Balabushka, the legendary billiards cue maker.
Nutrition: One serving of Balabushka contains 165 calories
